title: Paul B. Stager Jr Dies: Former SVP Legal Affairs At Warner Bros TV Was 96
full_text: Paul B. Stager Jr Dies: Former SVP Legal Affairs At Warner Bros TV Was 96. Paul B. Stager Jr, a longtime television legal affairs executive who spent decades at major studios including Warner Bros Television, died Sunday at his Westwood home after a brief illness. He was 96. A family representative said Stager died peacefully after …. Paul B. Stager Jr, a longtime television legal affairs executive who spent decades at major studios including Warner Bros Television, died Sunday at his Westwood home after a brief illness. He was 96… [+1388 chars]
